senti_text_processed: silas, whom we called for yesterday, is home safe and sound. media and others please delete the photo. thank you to those of you who helped lead.
the resund motorway is again fully passable in both directions.
in connection with a traffic accident on the resund motorway, eastbound traffic is diverted from exit lufthavn v, from where you can continue towards both the airport and sweden.

update about a person found dead at christiania. we have now finished working on the scene, and there is currently nothing to indicate that there should be a criminal relationship. we have no further information on the matter.
a -year-old man has just been remanded in custody until april. he is charged with attempted murder on emdrupvej on november . there are already two men aged and in custody in the case

citizens also showed up at the bailiff's court themselves, after we issued a press release about the action the week before, and nine showed up on the day of the action. we continue to encourage you to keep an eye on your e-boks and to clear up outstanding matters with the courts in the political circle

on march , we had a targeted campaign against citizens who had not been paid their debts to the bailiff's court. in that connection, we arrested people, and two turned themselves in to court after we contacted them

a demonstration involving approx. trucks are on their way from avedre to christiansborg castle square. it is expected to affect parts of the traffic in indre by, and we encourage road users to think about alternative routes through the city
we would very much like to hear from witnesses who have seen suspicious persons walking in the area or have made other observations that may be relevant to the investigation

we are still investigating the episode in tingbjerg on friday evening, where several shots were fired at an apartment. there are currently nothing that can explain why shots were fired at that particular apartment. the resident is an elderly citizen who has no contact with any criminal environments

a -year-old danish man was yesterday arrested and charged with violence committed against a portuguese tourist at copenhagen airport. the two did not know each other beforehand. the aggrieved tourist reached his flight after a trip past the emergency room. the -year-old was subsequently released
the last motorbikes have now left nrrebrogade, and the barriers have therefore been removed again
a -year-old man has just been remanded in custody until april. he is charged in the murder case from dragr fort on january , where a -year-old man was stabbed to death

there are now so many motorcycles gathered on nrrebrogade that we have blocked off the street from nrrebro's roundabout to nrrebro station. the procession moves towards the hill around and we will reopen nrrebrogade as soon as possible after that

last night we made a traffic effort at the intersection tuborgvej/emdrupvej. five motorists received a clip and a fine for driving too fast, three were fined for incorrect headlights and one was fined for not wearing a seat belt. in addition, one person was arrested for driving under the influence of alcohol

the easter holidays are upon us remember to get your neighbor to keep an eye on your house if he is home alone during the holidays.arrange holiday help with your neighbors and read more good advice here:
the procession follows this route: nrrebrogade lygten tagensvej tuborgvej strandvejen kystvejen strandvejen dyrehavevej christiansholmsvej klampenborgvej skovporten dyrehavsbakken
on the occasion of bakken's opening, tonight there is a motorcycle procession departing from nrrebrogade. busy runs towards bakken at , but nrrebrogade is expected to be blocked off already at

the police would never ask for information like that. please also be aware that these are both danish- and english-speaking men, and that it can be seen from the phone's display that they are calling from a number that ends in (i.e. that it looks like one of the police's numbers)

we are currently receiving a lot of reports about phone scams where perpetrators pretend to be from the police. they can claim, for example, that one's account has been hacked or that a loan has been taken out in one's name. in this way, they try to lure account information out of people

in the same period, we also received a report of shoplifting in indre by, where a shop detective detained a -year-old moroccan citizen. he too was in possession of goods that had not been paid for. he will be produced in a constitutional hearing later today
the arrested are two lithuanian citizens aged and respectively. the -year-old will be produced in a constitutional hearing later today

a shop detective reported two men yesterday at p.m., whom he suspected of having just committed theft in a shop in field's in amager. when the patrol arrived, the two people were arrested and found in possession of the stolen goods, which were delivered back to the store

in cooperation with colleagues in , we have arrested a -year-old woman and a -year-old man. they are charged with fraud to a total value of around dkk . both will be produced in constitutional hearings in the copenhagen district court tomorrow regarding custody

in the case of the shooting in field's on july , copenhagen police's prosecution has now brought charges against a -year-old man. among other things, he is charged with three murders and several attempted murders

we have arrested a -year-old man who is charged with threats to life and breach of the knife act in a business on valby langgade this morning. after a controversy, the perpetrator threatened a man with a knife. the victim grabbed the knife and thus cut his hand

the police, fire and ambulance services in vestegnen and in copenhagen call on road users on the motorways in greater copenhagen to help position themselves in a special way when traffic stops and emergency vehicles arrive.
seven men are produced today in a constitutional hearing charged with the sale of around two tons of hashish, mainly in pusher street in christiania
the -year-old was produced this afternoon in a constitutional hearing at the court in frederiksberg, where the judge decided to maintain the arrest for another three days

in a case of threats, robbery and possession of weapons, we have today arrested a -year-old boy. he is accused of threatening a shop employee, who had stopped him during a shoplifting in a supermarket in vanlse, both verbally and with a knife on march
we have arrested five young men for extensive telephone scams against elderly women. a -year-old man is being produced in a constitutional hearing today ://
the arrested person has been remanded in custody for days

in relation to the case from february, we have arrested a -year-old man on funen. he is charged with money laundering of approx. million dkk. he will be produced in a constitutional hearing tomorrow. for the sake of the investigation, we currently have no further comments

we can be found on horseback, but our four-legged staff is not quite full, so we are looking for new residents for the stables at amager. if you are a horse owner and think it could be your horse, read more in the press release here
the arrested person will be produced in a constitutional hearing today. another man has already been charged in the case

last night our colleagues in stopped a car in which the passenger was wanted for a robbery in frederiksberg in december. here, two perpetrators forced a man to transfer money via mobilepay, after which they stole his phone
a -year-old and a -year-old were arrested last night in vesterbro during an action against "white buddies". both men are produced in a constitutional hearing today.

in connection with the effort against the organized hash trade in pusher street in christiania, we arrested men yesterday for selling. it is about a -year-old, a -year-old and a -year-old. they are all produced in constitutional hearings today.
two men aged and have today been remanded in custody for days charged with attempted murder. the two men were arrested shortly after the stabbing
two people have been stabbed. one is seriously injured and one is slightly injured. two people have been arrested.
we are massively present at christiania following a report of a stabbing. we are in the process of investigating the circumstances and will update this channel when we can tell more.

: the six young people who were arrested yesterday and charged with a stabbing in a supermarket on january , have today been presentedthe six young people who were arrested yesterday and charged with a stabbing in a supermarket on january have today been brought before a constitutional hearing and remanded in custody. five of them until april , while one of them was imprisoned until april

we have recently been extra present at the airport following a report that a person had been seen with a weapon. however, it turned out to be a false alarm, and the effort has therefore been called off
we are preparing a major police operation aimed at debtors to the enforcement court. therefore, we strongly encourage you to settle, otherwise you risk being arrested
the missing person vladyslav from earlier today has been found again. thank you for your help.
in a coordinated action, we have today arrested six young people who are accused of a stabbing in a supermarket in nrrebro
we are canceling a previous request for a -year-old girl from tonight. she was found safe and sound. thanks for the help.

we are currently massively present in and around trnby torv in connection with the fact that two groups have been fighting. we are investigating the circumstances. several young people taken. no injuries sustained.
we have arrested a -year-old man who is charged with gross vat fraud for more than dkk million. he is produced in a constitutional hearing later today
the previously wanted woman has been found safe and sound. thanks to everyone who helped lead. media and others please delete any photos.
the -year-old has been remanded in custody for days

the victim ran after the perpetrator, and during the kilometer and a half long escape, the latter threw the watch away. along the way, they ran past a police patrol, which also looked for the perpetrator and arrested him. a dog patrol subsequently found the stolen watch

a -year-old moroccan man is produced today in a constitutional hearing. he is charged with having robbed a watch from a man in indre by last night. the perpetrator asked for fire and wanted to thank the victim by shaking his hand, but instead he tore the watch from his hand

shortly afterwards, the men tried to unzip passers-by's bags in two cases, but without succeeding in stealing anything. the two men, both years old, were arrested and will be produced today in a constitutional hearing

on thursday afternoon, we carried out a targeted effort against trick thieves. here, our colleagues observed two men who purposefully walked around the area around istedgade and vesterbrogade while showing interest in people's bags

it is a -year-old woman and a -year-old man. the woman was arrested in nordvest and the man in kastrup. they are produced in constitutional hearings at , and the prosecution will request closed doors

after further investigation into the case of the explosion at magleby torv, we arrested two people yesterday who are accused of having contributed to the explosion, which took place on the night of monday march
the investigation led to suspicion and charges for a further cases of theft. the man was today remanded in custody for a provisional days.

on saturday evening, the theft group was on the street in the area by rdhuspladsen. here they noticed a romanian man exhibiting suspicious behavior. upon inquiry, it turned out that he had just stolen an iphone from a restaurant. he admits to the theft.
the men, aged and , were brought before a constitutional hearing earlier today, where they received an immediate sentence of days in prison, as well as an entry ban for years

yesterday our watchful theft team saw two men steal a phone from a young woman who was queuing at a disco. the woman did not discover the theft. we arrested the two men and the woman got her phone back

control visits were also made to seven kiosks in nrrebro and sterbro, where we found approx. packs of swedish tobacco surrogates (nicotine pouches). in five of the kiosks, a marketing ban was issued against this, and in two of the places restrictions were also imposed

in two kiosks in amager and valby, a total of almost pills were seized, including dolol, alprazolam, morphine and viagra, and almost dkk . in addition, we found almost cans of snuff and approx. disposable e-cigarettes. three people have been charged
in the effort against the illegal sale of prescription medicine and tobacco products, in collaboration with , we have had a number of control actions against several copenhagen kiosks in recent days

yesterday afternoon we made a targeted traffic effort on nrrebrogade from nrrebro st. to flledvej. fines were handed out. cyclists ran a red light, four had no lights on their bikes, six cyclists used a phone while driving, and two vehicles drove in the bus lane
the -year-old will be produced in a constitutional hearing today. he is already charged in another case of more than shop thefts, mainly committed in and

last night we received reports of break-ins and broken windows in three restaurants on falkoner all in frederiksberg. one of the patrols that arrived at the scene was soon after able to arrest a -year-old man who is suspected of being behind the break-ins
after an intensive investigation, we have arrested a -year-old man who is suspected of being behind an explosion in dragr on the night of monday. the constitutional hearing will take place shortly

in connection with today's arrests, three addresses in amager were searched. here, among other things, an amount of cash, a bicycle workshop and several bicycles were found, which are probably also stolen. the two arrested will be produced in a constitutional hearing tomorrow

in october, the two people were sentenced to treatment and deported for six years for similar theft and theft of around bicycles. the judgment was appealed to the eastern high court. we issued this press release about the judgment from october

we leave peter bangs vej st. shortly, and train traffic has resumed. the deceased has been identified with great certainty, but the next of kin have not yet been notified

the visitation zone, which has been established in parts of nrrebro and in the northwest since february, expires today at and will not be extended. during the period, there have been no incidents in the visitation zone where weapons have been used. we have seized knives in the zone in the same period

we are present on peter bangs vej st., where a person has been hit. the person has passed away, but has not yet been identified. train operations have been stopped on the line in connection with the work of the police and the rescue team, and the time horizon is currently unknown

beware of fake text messages from the "police"scammers are currently sending out a text message pretending to be from the police telling you to pay a fine.the text message leads to a website similar to that of the police, where fraudsters try to get your personal information.
it does not immediately indicate that the fire was arson, but this must now be investigated further. sundholmsvej has been closed in connection with our presence, but it is now open to traffic again

we are currently present on sundholmsvej in amager, where there is smoke from a building. the fire has been extinguished and two people have been taken for treatment for smoke and fire injuries. the cause of the fire has not been determined at this time

the elderly are increasingly exposed to telephone fraud, where they are, for example, persuaded to hand over money or personal bank details. deputy police inspector peter hholt warned yesterday in : call is clear hang up!

we have had a good chat with several citizens at magleby torv. we pack up the mobile police station at , and then we return in the time period -18, when people have had time off from work. we encourage anyone who is unsafe or who has seen something to contact us

we have now finished the technical investigations on site. they show that it was a deliberate explosion. at present, we cannot say more about the background to the explosion, but the investigation continues

we are present with the mobile police station in dragr in the car park at magleby torv today from :00 a.m. this is in continuation of the fact that tonight at received a report about an explosion in a shop at the square

we check, among other things, that there are free fire doors, manage the alcohol licence, that they close on time and that there is not too much street space. we do this both for the sake of the safety of the nightlife guests and for the sake of the neighbors

when you meet us in the nightlife, we are usually in uniform, but we also have efforts that can be harder to spot, as they often take place in civilian clothes. we supervise that bars, clubs and discotheques comply with the rules
the fifth suspect in the case had his arrest maintained for another x hours at the constitutional hearing today

we subsequently found the -year-old driver at his residence in amager, where we impounded the car

yesterday, a motorist was measured to be driving km/h during roadworks in the trnby tunnel, where the speed limit has been reduced to km/h. it is crazy driving when the speed limit is more than % and over km/h

the car was spotted at the airport and shortly afterwards we arrested a -year-old chilean man in one of the terminals. he is produced in a constitutional hearing today

update: the driver was found in possession of grams of cocaine, which is why the suspect will be produced tomorrow. furthermore, the vehicle will be confiscated, cf. the rules on reckless driving. we would like to hear from witnesses to the driving process, and encourage you to call .

we are massively present at the intersection jagtvej/falkonr all in connection with a vehicle that would not stop for the police. no injuries and person has been arrested. traffic will be affected on site. we have no further for now.

a short time ago, we were present at citizen services at frederiksberg town hall, where a man behaved threateningly. we received a notification at and a few minutes later a patrol arrived at the scene and was able to arrest a -year-old man

we are currently receiving a number of inquiries from citizens because they receive emails pretending to come from us or europol. the citizens are accused of having committed a serious crime. these emails are fraud and should simply be deleted

three residents arrested two suspected bicycle thieves in a basement in kastrup on saturday evening. one, a -year-old boy, tried in vain to break free by using pepper spray and knuckle bars he had brought with him against the one resident. the boy is now i.a. charged with violence and weapon possession

a -year-old male pedestrian is seriously injured after he on friday at on borups all was hit by a car.there are no signs that the driver of the car was under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or was otherwise driving recklessly. nothing further.
woman previously reported missing from bispebjerg hospital found safe.

the investigation into the case continues and there are accomplices that we are still looking for. for the sake of the further investigation, we currently have no further information about the case

of the drivers also had their driving license suspended, and drivers drove so fast that they received a conditional suspension of their driving licence. the road work is expected to last another week

we continuously supervise that pubs, discotheques etc. comply with the rules. on saturday, an unauthorized doorman was expelled from a disco in indre by. the security company, which had employed the doorman, is accused of violating the law on security services

there is currently nothing to indicate that there is a criminal relationship. the next of kin have been informed. we have no further at this time. we have deleted the want, and request the media to do the same.

danger around sterbrogade no. . the roof construction is unsafe and fallout on the street. no traffic on sterbrogade between skt. jakobs plads and njsomhedvej. residents in the property between sterbrogade, njsomhedvej, kirsteingade and skt. jakobs plads must remain indoors.

we warn against these scam calls, which are carried out in a convincing manner. but neither your bank nor the police will ask you to provide your pin or come to collect your payment card. so be critical and take good care of your information. more good advice here

in some cases, the fraudsters offer to collect the payment card so that a new one can be issued. it happened on friday to a -year-old woman in indre by, and a lot of cash was subsequently withdrawn from the card. the case is now being investigated
